trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_DrawItem" name="DrawItem" href=""></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 데이터를 제공는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_DrawItem" name="DrawItem" href=""> </xref> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: The `DrawItem` event is raised by owner draw controls, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> controls.
trans-unit.target: `DrawItem` 이벤트와 같은 소유자 그리기 컨트롤에 의해 발생 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>컨트롤.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: It contains all the information that is needed for the user to paint the specified item, including the item index, the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>, and the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> on which the drawing should be done.
trans-unit.target: 사용자 항목 인덱스를 포함 하 여 지정된 된 항목을 그리는 데 필요한 모든 정보를 포함 된 <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>, 및 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>에 그리기 작업을 수행 해야 합니다.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs"></xref> class for the specified control with the specified font, state, surface to draw on, and the bounds to draw within.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs"> </xref> 를 그릴 지정된 된 글꼴, 상태,에서 이미지를 그릴 화면 및 범위 지정된 된 컨트롤에 대 한 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> surface on which to draw.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> 표면 그리려는입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> to use, usually the parent control's <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> 일반적으로 부모 컨트롤을 사용 하려면 <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> bounds to draw within.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> 내 그릴 범위입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection?displayProperty=fullName> index value of the item that is being drawn.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection?displayProperty=fullName> 그리고 있는 항목의 인덱스 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The control's <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState"></xref> information.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤의 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState"> </xref> 정보입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs"></xref> class for the specified control with the specified font, state, foreground color, background color, surface to draw on, and the bounds to draw within.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs"> </xref> 와 지정된 된 글꼴, 상태, 전경색, 배경색,에서 이미지를 그릴 화면 경계를 그릴 지정된 된 컨트롤에 대 한 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> surface on which to draw.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> 표면 그리려는입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> to use, usually the parent control's <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> 일반적으로 부모 컨트롤을 사용 하려면 <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> bounds to draw within.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> 내 그릴 범위입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection?displayProperty=fullName> index value of the item that is being drawn.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection?displayProperty=fullName> 그리고 있는 항목의 인덱스 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The control's <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState"></xref> information.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤의 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState"> </xref> 정보입니다.

trans-unit.source: The foreground <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> to draw the control with.
trans-unit.target: 전경 <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> 와 컨트롤을 그립니다.

trans-unit.source: The background <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> to draw the control with.
trans-unit.target: 백그라운드 <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> 와 컨트롤을 그립니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the background color of the item that is being drawn.
trans-unit.target: 그리고 있는 항목의 배경색을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: If the item's state is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState?displayProperty=fullName>, the BackColor is set to <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.HighlightText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 항목의 상태를 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState?displayProperty=fullName>, BackColor <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.HighlightText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.HighlightText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> 로 설정 된</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState?displayProperty=fullName> 경우

trans-unit.source: If the item's state is not <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState>, the BackColor property is set to <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Window%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 항목의 상태를 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState>, BackColor 속성이 <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Window%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Window%2A?displayProperty=fullName> 로 설정 된</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState> 경우

trans-unit.source: The background <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> of the item that is being drawn.
trans-unit.target: 백그라운드 <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> 그리고 있는 항목의 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the rectangle that represents the bounds of the item that is being drawn.
trans-unit.target: 그리고 있는 항목의 경계를 나타내는 사각형을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the bounds of the item that is being drawn.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> 그리고 있는 항목의 경계를 나타내는입니다.

trans-unit.source: Draws the background within the bounds specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor and with the appropriate color.
trans-unit.target: 에 지정 된 경계 내에서 배경을 그립니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> 생성자를 생성 하 고 적절 한 색을 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the item being drawn is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState>, the background is drawn with the text highlighted.
trans-unit.target: 끄는 항목이 있으면 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState>, 강조 표시 된 텍스트를 사용 하 여 배경을 그린.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState>

trans-unit.source: Draws a focus rectangle within the bounds specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 에 지정 된 경계 내에서 포커스 영역을 그립니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> 생성자입니다.

trans-unit.source: If the item being drawn has <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState>, the focus rectangle is drawn.
trans-unit.target: 항목에 있는 경우 그리고 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState>, 포커스 사각형을 그립니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState>

trans-unit.source: Gets the font that is assigned to the item being drawn.
trans-unit.target: 그리고 있는 항목에 할당 된 글꼴을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: A suggested <xref:System.Drawing.Font>, usually the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A> property of the parent control.
trans-unit.target: 제안 된 <xref:System.Drawing.Font>, 일반적으로 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A>부모 컨트롤의 속성입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Font>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> that is assigned to the item being drawn.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> 그리고 항목에 할당 된 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the foreground color of the of the item being drawn.
trans-unit.target: 전경색을 가져옵니다는 그리고 항목의 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the item's state is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState?displayProperty=fullName>, the ForeColor is set to <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.HighlightText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 항목의 상태를 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState?displayProperty=fullName>, 전경색 <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.HighlightText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.HighlightText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> 로 설정 된</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState?displayProperty=fullName> 경우

trans-unit.source: If the item's state is not <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState>, the ForeColor property is set to <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.WindowText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 항목의 상태를 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState>, ForeColor 속성이 <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.WindowText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.WindowText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> 로 설정 된</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState> 경우

trans-unit.source: The foreground <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> of the item being drawn.
trans-unit.target: 전경 <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> 그리고 항목의 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the graphics surface to draw the item on.
trans-unit.target: 항목 그릴 그래픽 화면을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> surface to draw the item on.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> 화면에 항목을 그릴 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index value of the item that is being drawn.
trans-unit.target: 그리고 있는 항목의 인덱스 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: This property returns the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Item%2A> value of the item being drawn in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Item%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection?displayProperty=fullName> 그리고 항목의 값</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Item%2A> 반환

trans-unit.source: This property can return -1 if itemswere removed from the list.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성 itemswere 목록에서 제거 하는 경우-1을 반환할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The numeric value that represents the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Item*> value of the item being drawn.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 숫자 값의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Item*>그리고 항목의 값입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Item*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the item being drawn.
trans-unit.target: 그리고 항목의 상태를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: This property value can be a combination of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState> enumeration members.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성 값의 조합 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState>열거형 멤버.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState>

trans-unit.source: The members can be combined by using bitwise operators.
trans-unit.target: 비트 연산자를 사용 하 여 멤버를 결합할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState"></xref> that represents the state of the item being drawn.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState"> </xref> 그리고 항목의 상태를 나타내는입니다.
